ygData.subject: Soloing
ygData.msgSnippet: Subject: Soloing I have found the Karanas an excellent place to solo, as a level 18 myself. North Karana has lots of borer and Scythe Beetles and Griffawns to
ygData.messageBody:
Subject: Soloing
I have found the Karanas an excellent place to solo, as a level 18 myself. North Karana has lots of borer and Scythe Beetles and Griffawns to take on, (still havent managed to do a Griffawn myself without lay hands yet). In East Karana there are lots of blue baddies, from Griff's to gorge hounds to Chasam crawlers. I hope this helps you out.

FattyBear 18th



Where is a good place for a 18th lvl paladin to go solo blues? I have travelled
some and cant find a place that is either WAY to crowded or that you MUST have a
group to survive the trains. I am on the MM server and am currently in Freeport.
ANy and all help is appreciated as I am starting to get bored and want to keep
playing. Thanks all.
Frett
